channel.title: ★ Project Xiva | 667 (Orginal) | Instant Pking or Train 35% Increased Drops Rate
channel.description:
[CENTER]
[admin=Links] Links: [B][SIZE=3][IMG]http://i918.photobucket.com/albums/ad28/Tomb1443/Notorious%20Advertisement%20Pictures/icon_homepage_zpsfcc29152.png[/img] Website:[/SIZE][/B][SIZE=3] http://www.project-xiva.com[/SIZE] [B][SIZE=3][IMG]http://i918.photobucket.com/albums/ad28/Tomb1443/Notorious%20Advertisement%20Pictures/play_zps82372811.gif[/img] Download:[/SIZE][/B][SIZE=3] [URL=http://"http://www.project-xiva.com/clients/playnow.html"]Click Here[/URL][/SIZE][B][SIZE=3] [/SIZE][/B][IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/72ysmt.png[/img][SIZE=3][B] Forums:[/B] [URL=http://"http://www.project-xiva.com/community"]Click Here[/URL][/SIZE]
[/admin]
[ADMIN=Some Features] - Custom made tutorial, covers most content. - Advanced Slayer - Wealth Calculation for High Risk fighting - Perfect Dharok's Formula - Fully working granite gmaul special. - Perfect combat formulas. - Void & Void elite effects - Duel Arena - Fully working prayer books - Fully working spell books - Correct multi zones - Improved combat system, rewritten methods. - Flawless switching - Ring of life - Mage Of Zamorak, with abyss - Runecrafting with points and a shop - Pure 667 cache. (2011 Style) - Perfect curse leeches, including leech special attack. - Custom quest tab interface which displays player statistics. - Lootshare system, advanced sharing for friends and PvM Clans - Upgradable weapons such as, dark bow, granite maul, armadyl godsword, dragon claws and bandos.[/admin]
[admin=PvM] - Tormented Demons - Corporeal beast - Desert, Jungle, Ice strykewyrms - Green, Blue, Black, Iron, Steel, Brutal, Mith dragons - King Black Dragon - Bandos - Armadyl - Dagganoth kings - Several more![/admin]
[admin=Skilling] - Nearly every skill can be trained to achieve a Max cape. - Achievements with rewards (We currently have 23/25 trainable skills with more to come)[/admin]
[admin=Information] Project Xiva is a 667 server, based off of RS 2011. We have amazing, unseen content which makes us unique. [/admin]
[admin=Media] [SPOILER=Server Images]
[img]http://gyazo.com/de9a0d4569b8ce4df2f713eea9bac161.png[/img]

[IMG]http://gyazo.com/2415aaef043b0342b3938053ca29facd.png[/img]
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/def03dd14036b9988cd162b4591cf15d.png[/img]

[img]http://gyazo.com/cde77b6181a40b9ff254e813a4a8688b.gif[/img]
[img]http://gyazo.com/71bb925e269947cd744f6cca0f4ae739.gif[/img]
[img]http://gyazo.com/dbfbc159896754833a8f36c6201cb400.gif[/img]
[img]http://gyazo.com/0528fc298ca1524d31baec776ff99c68.gif[/img]
Hybridding stacked dds hit
[img]http://gyazo.com/93daa2abb975479d6977580e456e55fc.gif[/img]
Random Events Manager:
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1lGqhkQi_jo&feature=youtu.be]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1lGqhkQi_jo&feature=youtu.be[/url]
NPC Dicing:
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rruZPIt9E2Y]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rruZPIt9E2Y[/url]
New wilderness: No longer a ditch + reworked.
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/ed86174424d8c1afedb96dc56145ebd7.gif[/img]
Friends chats now say the amount of people in the chat:
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/c5ed72f89dcd8d243c9d43fdc947cee5.png[/img]
Friends chat lottery:
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/e6f53dfb76705d9548ad95168d901f24.png[/img]
[SIZE=7]MORE IMAGES TO COME![/SIZE] [/SPOILER][/admin]
[/CENTER]
[center][SIZE=5][B]- FAQ -[/B][/SIZE]
Q) How long have you been programming java. A) 10 Months? maybe 8?..
Q) What revision is your server? A) That's a funny question. It's a 666 look a like with old maps. A 'fake 666' as some call it.
Q) Why do you have bad rep on here? A) Because people don't like the truth, everything and say I don't mean to come off offensive or like I'm 'hating' it just seems like it. And my feedback is honest.
Q) Why isn't this in the Project section? since you update it and add more content A) Because.. It was the feather base; I only feel as though people who make their own framework / networking should post and since I didn't do either It's pointless, I mean I'm changing the framework, slowly writing the networking and content to my design but it will never fully be my framework >.>
[img]http://i.imgur.com/k0KjwjN.gif[/img]
[B][SIZE=6]- Update Thread -[/SIZE][/B] [/center] 06/04/2015
- Players can now open link messages which are sent every 1 hour by the server by clicking on it or right clicking 'Open' - DFS Charging has been added - Finally got around to adding Charater customization - Who ever declines the trade now gets a message saying they have declined. - If your trade partner removes an item in trade you will see a red mark indicating the item he removed; this will fade within seconds. - Designed a new method to remove global objects and the clipping. - Prayer draining has been redone, it's more realistic now. (Including smiting) - The gate behind the spirit tree has been removed. - Fixed the glitch with the wilderness icon on your screen, when you're out of the wilderness it will now remove straight away - Arrows have been added to the range - You can no longer walk on the bank booths at home. (Issue with my walking packet - fixed anyways) - Added a YouTuber rank in game, if you get the rank you will be given the cape and the youtube icon next to your name. If you want the rank make videos for the server and if they're good enough, you'll be accepted. - Thieving EXP rates have been decreased. - You can now set your appearance by clicking the '?' button in the top right corner of your screen. [center] Media has been posted below.
[img]http://gyazo.com/0c9f7c4da6c6cb80810c7fed404ef06e.png[/img]
[img]http://gyazo.com/23a49b10037f29d53012cdff9d7820e5.png[/img]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t7-MQ_o0U5k&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]
[/center]

item.title: ★ Project Xiva | 667 (Orginal) | Instant Pking or Train 35% Increased Drops Rate
item.dc:creator: @xiva xiva
item.description:
@xiva wrote:

[CENTER]

[admin=Links]
Links:
[B][SIZE=3] Website:[/SIZE][/B][SIZE=3] http://www.project-xiva.com[/SIZE]
[B][SIZE=3] Download:[/SIZE][/B][SIZE=3] [URL=http://“http://www.project-xiva.com/clients/playnow.html”]Click Here[/URL][/SIZE][B][SIZE=3]
[/SIZE][/B][SIZE=3][B] Forums:[/B] [URL=http://“http://www.project-xiva.com/community”]Click Here[/URL][/SIZE]

[/admin]

[ADMIN=Some Features]

  • Custom made tutorial, covers most content.
  • Advanced Slayer
  • Wealth Calculation for High Risk fighting
  • Perfect Dharok’s Formula
  • Fully working granite gmaul special.
  • Perfect combat formulas.
  • Void & Void elite effects
  • Duel Arena
  • Fully working prayer books
  • Fully working spell books
  • Correct multi zones
  • Improved combat system, rewritten methods.
  • Flawless switching
  • Ring of life
  • Mage Of Zamorak, with abyss
  • Runecrafting with points and a shop
  • Pure 667 cache. (2011 Style)
  • Perfect curse leeches, including leech special attack.
  • Custom quest tab interface which displays player statistics.
  • Lootshare system, advanced sharing for friends and PvM Clans
  • Upgradable weapons such as, dark bow, granite maul, armadyl godsword, dragon claws and bandos.[/admin]

[admin=PvM]

  • Tormented Demons
  • Corporeal beast
  • Desert, Jungle, Ice strykewyrms
  • Green, Blue, Black, Iron, Steel, Brutal, Mith dragons
  • King Black Dragon
  • Bandos
  • Armadyl
  • Dagganoth kings
  • Several more![/admin]

[admin=Skilling]

  • Nearly every skill can be trained to achieve a Max cape.
  • Achievements with rewards
    (We currently have 23/25 trainable skills with more to come)[/admin]

[admin=Information]
Project Xiva is a 667 server, based off of RS 2011.
We have amazing, unseen content which makes us unique. [/admin]

[admin=Media]
[SPOILER=Server Images]

Hybridding stacked dds hit

Random Events Manager:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1lGqhkQi_jo&feature=youtu.be

NPC Dicing:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rruZPIt9E2Y

New wilderness: No longer a ditch + reworked.

Friends chats now say the amount of people in the chat:

Friends chat lottery:

[SIZE=7]MORE IMAGES TO COME![/SIZE]
[/SPOILER][/admin]

[/CENTER]

[center][SIZE=5][B]- FAQ -[/B][/SIZE]

Q) How long have you been programming java.
A) 10 Months? maybe 8?..

Q) What revision is your server?
A) That’s a funny question. It’s a 666 look a like with old maps. A ‘fake 666’ as some call it.

Q) Why do you have bad rep on here?
A) Because people don’t like the truth, everything and say I don’t mean to come off offensive or like I’m ‘hating’ it just seems like it. And my feedback is honest.

Q) Why isn’t this in the Project section? since you update it and add more content
A) Because… It was the feather base; I only feel as though people who make their own framework / networking should post and since I didn’t do either It’s pointless, I mean I’m changing the framework, slowly writing the networking and content to my design but it will never fully be my framework >.>

[B][SIZE=6]- Update Thread -[/SIZE][/B]
[/center]
06/04/2015

  • Players can now open link messages which are sent every 1 hour by the server by clicking on it or right clicking ‘Open’
  • DFS Charging has been added
  • Finally got around to adding Charater customization
  • Who ever declines the trade now gets a message saying they have declined.
  • If your trade partner removes an item in trade you will see a red mark indicating the item he removed; this will fade within seconds.
  • Designed a new method to remove global objects and the clipping.
  • Prayer draining has been redone, it’s more realistic now. (Including smiting)
  • The gate behind the spirit tree has been removed.
  • Fixed the glitch with the wilderness icon on your screen, when you’re out of the wilderness it will now remove straight away
  • Arrows have been added to the range
  • You can no longer walk on the bank booths at home. (Issue with my walking packet - fixed anyways)
  • Added a YouTuber rank in game, if you get the rank you will be given the cape and the youtube icon next to your name. If you want the rank make videos for the server and if they’re good enough, you’ll be accepted.
  • Thieving EXP rates have been decreased.
  • You can now set your appearance by clicking the ‘?’ button in the top right corner of your screen.
    [center]
    Media has been posted below.

[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t7-MQ_o0U5k&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]

[/center]
